reviewtext: The package arrives neatly packaged and properly secured. The packaging is easy to open and everything needed is included except for an ethernet cable, but you should have 1 or 2 of these laying around already.Installation is super easy, just plug in the power connector and plug in your in and out ethernet connections and you're done.Construction is very solid and I can see this box lasting almost forever unless you drop it from a 20 story building.
